overview: In coastal Cornwall, England, during the early 19th Century, a young woman who's come there to visit her aunt, discovers that she's married an inkeeper who's a member of a gang of criminals who arrange shipwrecking and murder for profit.
tagline: Charles Laughton's eyebrows have a lifestyle to maintain and don't care how many sailors die to maintain it.
cast: Charles Laughton|Maureen O'Hara|Robert Newton|Leslie Banks|Marie Ney
